data.title: Elton Brand on the Sterling-Era Clippers, His Path to GM, and Staying Off Social Media
authors: The JJ Redick Podcast With Tommy Alter
data.meta_description: Plus, everything you need to know about playing at Duke
data.text:
JJ Redick is joined by Philadelphia 76ers general manager Elton Brand to discuss playing for the Los Angeles Clippers when Donald Sterling owned the team (06:01), his path from NBA player to general manager (22:55), why he’s not on social media (33:51), who’s helping him as a mentor now (42:08), and, of course, Duke (43:25).

Subscribe: Apple Podcasts / Art19 / Stitcher / RSS / SoundCloud
